trial_type.Description: Kind of event that may occur during a run

Levels.fixation_change: Fixation cross changes from black to red, indicating subject should respond
Levels.response: Subject's response to fixation cross color change, using button box

image_category.Description: Category of image used in trial

reaction_time.Description: Subject reaction time to changing fixation cross

imnet_filename.Description: Filename of stimulus on ImageNet. Suffix '_scr' indicates image was scrambled.
